reviews.customers_say: Customers find the hoodie dress comfortable and well-made, with a perfect length that covers the butt and isn't too tight.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long and comfy
items.body: Looking for a cozy and stylish option to wear during the Halloween and Christmas seasons? Check out the Quenteen Women Halloween Christmas Hoodie Dress! This casual and oversized sweatshirt dress is perfect for staying warm and comfortable while still looking fashionable. Featuring long sleeves and a hood, this dress is perfect for those chilly autumn and winter days. The oversized fit and cozy fabric make it ideal for lounging at home, running errands, or attending festive gatherings during the holiday season. With a fun and playful design that combines elements of Halloween and Christmas, this dress is a versatile choice for both holidays. The dress also includes a convenient pocket, perfect for storing your essentials or keeping your hands warm. Made with high-quality materials and attention to detail, this hoodie dress is not only stylish but also durable and easy to care for. Whether you're dressing up for a holiday party or just want a comfortable and cute outfit for everyday wear, this dress is a great option. Add some festive flair to your wardrobe with the Quenteen Women Halloween Christmas Hoodie Dress. It's the perfect blend of comfort and style, making it a must-have for the holiday season. Don't miss out on this cozy and chic dress that will keep you looking and feeling great all season long. Read more
items.author: Tiara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: Runs big but very soft and comfy. Super cute ü•∞ Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hoodie Dress
items.body: Runs big, but like over sized (very comfortable) good for something quick to throw on and go out. Like the big pocket. Comes in different color options to purchase. Not as thick as a normal hoodie material so not super warm but also not super cold Read more
items.author: chels

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for me.
items.body: Perfect for me. Not too heavy. Lightweight enough that I won‚Äôt be too hot. I can put a tank top underneath to take the chill off in the winter or wear it with leggings or jeans for a casual day out. Colors are beautiful and vibrant. I bought the bright pink and also the olive green. Falls just above me knees. I bought a size Small which is still roomy for me. I am 4‚Äô11‚Äù, 135 lbs, 34DD, and curvy. I want to get 2 more. Amazon recommended a size Medium but Small is better for me. Read more
items.author: stephanie myhand

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wore with leggings and boots.
items.body: Super comfy. Don't adjust size. Very warm and cute! Read more
items.author: Asheley B

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fit alright, but very casual looking in person.
items.body: The fit was ok, a little bigger than the chart made it seem it would be. The color and fabric quality were nice, but the way this dress is designed makes in look like you're wearing a blanket. Wasn't quite what I was looking for. Read more
items.author: Liana Oliver

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Comfortable and true to the size you can be comfortable and still look nice Read more
items.author: Kimberly Sullivan

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fine but arrived FILTHY
items.body: Arrived covered in animal hair which I am very allergic to and find disgusting. Very thin material, not heavy but good length and not boxy. Has pockets but not functional. Wearable with leggings. Read more
items.author: Alice

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-deep Red, A-mint Green, Aqua, Christmas Lamp, Christmas Tree, P-red-2, A-apricot, A-bb Pink, Christmas Truck, A-dark Grey, A-pink, Christmas Snowman, Merry Christmas, A-white. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
